title: Cruelty Not Motivating Workers? Vaccines Working Longterm! 6.29.21
itunes:title: Cruelty Not Motivating Workers? Vaccines Working Longterm! 6.29.21
description:
In episode 940, Jack and Miles are joined by American Hysteria's Chelsey Weber-Smith to discuss people continuing to refuse to work for exploitive wages, Miles Taylor claiming he will stop Trump, a study showing that vaccines may have lasting immunity, the Pentagon having zero explanation for UFO's, and more! Plus super producer Anna Hossnieh pops in for Anna's Streaming Corner!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Where Jobless Benefits Were Cut, Jobs Are Still Hard to Fill
  2. Miles Taylor Will Stop Donald Trump From Winning Again In 2024 Or His Name’s Not ‘Anonymous’
  3. Pfizer and Moderna Vaccines Likely to Produce Lasting Immunity, Study Finds
  4. U.S. Has No Explanation for Unidentified Objects and Stops Short of Ruling Out Aliens
  5. UFO report: US finds no explanation for sightings
  6. The Truth Has Not Always Been Out There
  7. UFO report: US finds no explanation for sightings
  8. LISTEN: Hiatus Kaiyote - 'Sparkle Tape Break Up' (Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
